title: LA MARATHON font id
content:
I know i've seen this blocky font around everywhere, was wondering if anybody could suggest some ones closest to the 'MARA' type in black.

Thank you!

Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110326043633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LaMarathonposterweb-500x743_5483.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LaMarathonposterweb-500x743.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110326043633/http:/typophile.com/files/LaMarathonposterweb-500x743.jpg) | 114.28 KB |
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
Here are a few options:

[P22 Constructivist Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20110326043633/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/p22/p22_constructivist_block/)  
 [Dessau Geometrik](http://web.archive.org/web/20110326043633/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fountain/dessau_pro_geometrik/)  
 [Cooter Deuce Plugged](http://web.archive.org/web/20110326043633/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/typetrust/cooter_deuce_plugged/)
